channel.title: [PI] Need Help!
channel.description: How do i make the server automatically announce whenever somebody reaches 99 in a skill? [code] Santa Has Just Achieved 99 Strength! [/code] ?

item.title: [PI] Need Help!

item.description:
@CodeBest wrote:

[quote=“doritos own, post:2, topic:446943”]Open PlayerAssistant
Search For: public void l e v e l up(int skill) {
Replace your l e v e l up with mine:

[code]public void l*****p(int skill) {
int totalLevel = (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]));
sendFrame126(“Total Lvl: “+totalLevel, 3984);
switch(skill) {
case 0:
sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!”, 6248);
sendFrame126(“Your attack level is now “+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+”.”, 6249);
c.sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level.”);
c.getItems().addItem(4151,1);
sendFrame164(6247);
if(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendClan(“SERVER”, c.playerName+” just advanced to “+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+” Attack! Congratulations!”, “Global Chat”, 2);
c2.sendClan(“SERVER”, c.playerName+ " Received A 99 Reward! Congratulations!", “Global Chat”, 2);

				}
			}
		}
		break;
		
		case 1:
        sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254);
        sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+".", 6255);
        c.sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level.");
        c.getItems().addItem(4151,1);
		sendFrame164(6253);
		if(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) {
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
					c2.sendClan("SERVER", c.playerName+" just advanced to "+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+" Defence!", "Global Chat", 2);
					c2.sendClan("SERVER", c.playerName+ " Received A 99 Reward! Congratulations!", "Global Chat", 2);
				}
			}
		}
		break;
		
		case 2:
        sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207);
        sendFrame126("Your strength level is now "+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+".", 6208);
        c.sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level.");

		case 3:

To Change Reward For 99’s:

Replace with whatever you wish.

that is not my tutorial btw[/quote]

oh my god… why would you do this :mad:

just call it once at the top of the method, no need to clutter up space like that

item.title: [PI] Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

Open PlayerAssistant
Search For: public void l e v e l up(int skill) {
Replace your l e v e l up with mine:

[code]public void l*****p(int skill) {
int totalLevel = (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]));
sendFrame126(“Total Lvl: “+totalLevel, 3984);
switch(skill) {
case 0:
sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!”, 6248);
sendFrame126(“Your attack level is now “+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+”.”, 6249);
c.sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level.”);
c.getItems().addItem(4151,1);
sendFrame164(6247);
if(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendClan(“SERVER”, c.playerName+” just advanced to “+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+” Attack! Congratulations!”, “Global Chat”, 2);
c2.sendClan(“SERVER”, c.playerName+ " Received A 99 Reward! Congratulations!", “Global Chat”, 2);

				}
			}
		}
		break;
		
		case 1:
        sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254);
        sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+".", 6255);
        c.sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level.");
        c.getItems().addItem(4151,1);
		sendFrame164(6253);
		if(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) {
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
					c2.sendClan("SERVER", c.playerName+" just advanced to "+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+" Defence!", "Global Chat", 2);
					c2.sendClan("SERVER", c.playerName+ " Received A 99 Reward! Congratulations!", "Global Chat", 2);
				}
			}
		}
		break;
		
		case 2:
        sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207);
        sendFrame126("Your strength level is now "+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])+".", 6208);
        c.sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level.");
        c.getItems().addItem(4151,1);
		sendFrame164(6206);
		if(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) {
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

To Change Reward For 99’s:

that is not my tutorial btw

item.title: [PI] Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

How do i make the server automatically announce whenever somebody reaches 99 in a skill?

Santa Has Just Achieved 99 Strength! ?

Read full topic
